short_summary: This requirement is to purchase items for the King Air C90A Fleet for Transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD).
description: This request for proposal (RFP) is open only to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders for procurement of T8493-140035 series.
full_summary:
================================

### Title: SA RFP T8493-230075A - Items for King Air C90A

#### Amendment Number:

This tender announcement is amended, reference number WS4423032909-Doc4423170812, solicitation number WS4423032909, amendment number 1, published on 2024-02-01.

#### Tender Details

* Tender closing date: 2024-02-12 at 14:00:00
* The tender status is **Expired**.
* The expected contract start and end dates are not specified.

#### Goods and Services

* UNSPSC: Aircraft Guidance Systems (25201604)
* Goods and services are required to support Transport Canada's (TC) King Air C90A Fleet.

#### Procurement Method

* Competitive - Selective Tendering

#### Request for Proposal

Transport Canada is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the acquisition of items for its King Air C90A Fleet. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

Aero Precision Industries LLC
Aero Supplies Inc
Non-Destructive Testing Products Ltd
Execaire
Maxcraft Avionics Ltd.
MHD Rockland
Patlon Aircraft & Industries Ltd.
Pole Air Aviation
Professional Aviation Associates
Standard Aero
Textron Aviation
Tower Aerospace
Tulmar Safety
Unisource Technology Inc
Vector Aerospace Atlantic
Zepoli International Inc
PHP Canada
BSF International Inc
Field Aviation
JHT Defense
Kadex Aero Supply
Newcastle Aviation Partners LLC
Southeast Aerospace
Canada West Avionics
CanRep Inc.
Voyageur Avparts Inc.
Genaire LTD
Kitchener Aero (dba Mid-Canada Mod Center)
PAL Aerospace
Tronosjet Maintenance
Aero Technical Components
Arnprior Aerospace
Pratt & Whitney Canada

#### Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Terms and Conditions

* Suppliers must be qualified and hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) for the T8493-140035 series.
* Proposals are to be submitted electronically in accordance with the tender specifications.

**Contact**

Bootsma, Lena (SPAC/PSPC)
lena.bootsma@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
